name: Lucky Monster 0.2 - early access
description:
Here's is the second part of Lucky Monster, where we continue the story, some rangers still need to be dealt with!

The new part include 9 animated scenes, we continue the main story and there's new side quests. We updated some part of the gameplay, added a quest log and some controls to make the battles less clicking (we still have to improve it but it will come)

If you find some bugs or something you think can be improved, let us know, it might be on our list already but we take every constructive comments.

public version will be available around the 18 of April
